Detailed Description

Bit set to describe the type of event in the TCMT.

kMinNumberMuonLikeTowers 

min number of muon like towers reached

kMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers 

within max number of muon like towers

kMinNumberMuonLikeLayers 

min number of muon like layers reached

kMaxNumberTotalHitsMuon 

within max number of total hits

kMinNumberTotalHitsMuon 

min number of total hits reached

kMaxSumEnergyMuon 

within max energy sum

kMinSumEnergyMuon
